coreAttributes.authorTag: On one side of the cylinder, a small engraving reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: revolving tranquiliser rifle
coreAttributes.description: Firing aura-piercing fin-stabilized discarding sabot darts filled with a potent sleeping potion, this rifle is not a true sniping weapon. Rather, it is designed to extend the reach of a standard Enforcer squad. Unlike most dart rifles, it uses a six-shot revolving autoloader.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] out the rifle, [npc.verb(load)] a fresh gas bottle, and [npc.verb(insert)] a full-moon clip of six darts into the autoloader.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the unspent darts from the autoloader, [npc.verb(unload)] the gas bottle, and [npc.verb(put)] the rifle away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] [npc2.name] up in [npc.her] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. The needle on the end of the dart embeds itself in [npc2.namePos] aura and releases its contents. #IF !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_DUALITY_NEGATIVE) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_DUALITY_NEGATIVE, 6)] [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(struggle)] to defend [npc2.herself] as [npc2.her] eyelids grow visibly heavier. #ENDIF

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(line)] [npc2.name] up in [npc.her] sights and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. The shot goes wide! The dart clatters uselessly on the ground.
